content:
On the evening of April 1, a victim was injured in Kryvyi Rih.

About thisReportsHead of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak.

“The wreckage of iron was injured by a 42-year-old woman. She is in the hospital, ”he said.

In the house near the explosive wave, windows are knocked out. The forestry ignition was recorded.

"We clarify information about the consequences of the attack," said Sergei Lisak.

As reportedArmyinform, during the day, April 1, the Russian army attacked the Nikopol region with artillery and shock drones.

To recap, air defense Ukrainian in the Dnipropetrovsk regionDestroyedhostile controlled X-59 rocket.
title: Russian troops hit Kryvyi Rih: wounded a woman
description: About it reports the head of Dnipropetrovsk Ova Sergey Lisak. “The fragments of the iron ...
author: Army Inform
